-- Prepared Statements tests;

--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5"
    )
    properties = (
        "prop1" = "val1",
        "prop2" = "val2"
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

-- ps with no params;
prepare select * from test_source_1 where col0 > 5 order by col0;
|PS_ID|
|0|
1 rows returned
execute 0;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|
|6|600|6000|6234.4321|62345678.99|str6|
|7|700|7000|7234.4321|72345678.99|str7|
|8|800|8000|8234.4321|82345678.99|str8|
|9|900|9000|9234.4321|92345678.99|str9|
|10|1000|10000|10234.4321|93345678.99|str10|
5 rows returned

-- now test each col type;

prepare select * from test_source_1 where col0 > ? order by col0;
|PS_ID|
|1|
1 rows returned
execute 1 6;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|
|7|700|7000|7234.4321|72345678.99|str7|

-- ps with two params;
prepare select * from test_source_1 where col0 > ? and col1 > ? order by col0;
|PS_ID|
|7|
1 rows returned
execute 7 6 800;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|
|9|900|9000|9234.4321|92345678.99|str9|
|10|1000|10000|10234.4321|93345678.99|str10|
2 rows returned

-- ps with params for all cols;
prepare select * from test_source_1 where col0 = ? and col1 = ? and col2 = ? and col3 = ? and col4 = ? and col5 = ? order by col0;
|PS_ID|
|8|
1 rows returned
execute 8 6 600 6000 6234.4321 62345678.99 "str6";
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|
|6|600|6000|6234.4321|62345678.99|str6|
1 rows returned

--close session;
use test;
0 rows returned
-- ps should now be closed as session was closed;
execute 8 6 600 6000 6234.4321 62345678.99 "str6";
Failed to execute statement: PDB0007 - Unknown prepared statement, id: 8

drop source test_source_1;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic;
